message.body: Little sparkly colon is scheming up birthday ideas for you!
Oh god, you read my mind. I literally was just getting dark about it again
Im listening to everything you tell me, gonna do it all
Oh boy! Maybe not everything! I will have you eating sugar at a cheesy spa! Have you heard of spa castle? It sounded really fun but I just looked at the website and its expensive!
I am trying to involve Earth in your birthday adventure too! Don't tell her yet! I don't want her to get too excited....
She's asking me what yr txting, she does not miss a beat. I think she's getting antsy living with a grandpa
Definitely do not mention spa castle then. It's right up her alley!
What do you value most about a celebratory event?
I would like it to be not too expensive, but good for a group...ending with alcohol.
Im gonna be 30, so I guess goofy
Got it.
Also. Can leave the city. All those things u said made me really want to get my license done and over with.
Would you rather stay inside the city? How many people do you think you might have--10 or so?
Ooh yes license!
Haha. Me and my mom so far :)
Love that.
I want it to be simple but exciting.
Do you have any favorite childhood bday times or traditions?
What would be inspiring for you?
I like being outside. My mom makes me cake, that's usually separate from friend time.
Im kinda simple. Fire cf's are secretly reaaaaaallll boring
Perfect
Colon CFs are outlandish!!!
Live it love it
I like that you are simple. I get that. I want it to be light and fun too.
Also, yr staying the 26th?
Yes the 26 I think. That's a Sunday right?
Yes. Doing my may calendar.
Actually amazed that the week Laura is here, I have no school. Go figure.
Woo hoo! The universe conspired for you!!! Do you have school the 27th? Monday? My bus leaves at 3. I can hang with you or alone. Either way.
You. Monday. We could go stare at a tree
If we are still human

I would love to stare at a tree with you. I someday want to go see the Brooklyn botanical gardens. I may need to sleep late since I have to get up at 3:45 to get to the bus in Sunday morning! I hope I'm not half dead. Lets say that I won't be.
Did you make an Acu appt by the way? :)
Oh. 3:45 am?
Yes! Bus is at 5am
Holy ballz. We both are gonna want to stay at megs...
Making one tmrw! Got her number today
Kind of stinks now that I know we probably have a night tx. But last time I was in NYC with you I got up at 4am for clean needle and we stayed out late and I was fine.
Yah for appts! Report back if you wanna.
I would sleep wherever I can! Gladly.
Yeah, we got this
Time to sleep. More texting tomorrow?
I get so excited when I see everyone I'm not gonna want to sleep anyways!
So true...sweet dreams
Same to you. xoxo
Check yr email and tell me if I'm on the right track....
Yes. Love it. Also heard about a gay jump roping competition, which may be good local fun.
Earth told me she wants to meet hazel, but she's a little afraid of heights
Oh Earth. :)
Do you ever have non-sparkly Shen days? I feel like I could slip out of my own skin today. I just don't feel like I'm connected/ing sometimes. Maybe it's a metal cf thing or an old protective habit.
Oh, I have those days. Alot of them. I think the pressure we upper jiaos put on ourselves is extreme.
I think on days like those, I tend to take myself to the movies or zone out with something
If you were closer, id be over with Sarah
Oh, I have those days. Alot of them. I think the pressure we upper jiaos put on ourselves is extreme.

I would love to have you and Sarah all curled up in my room. We would get icecream (I really hope you like icecream) and I would feel human again. I pepped myself up a bit by finding more fun things for your birthday. Would Earth like strawberry picking?
My birthday list is worthy of a frame. Holy moley.
Yes, but she needs her umbrella and blanket. Diva.
I keep reminding myself its your birthday not Earth's but I know if I can find something that would please the pickiest rabbit on earth it would also be good for her grandpa tomboy mom/dad.
Thanks for writing back to me. I guess I expect to feel wide-eyed and content and rooted all the time but I don't.
Yes, I love ice cream!
Sigh of relief! I also have a thing for organic chocolate milk. ☺
Thank you. ￼
